attributes.action: PAY THE WINDRUSH GENERATION VICTIMS THE COMPENSATION THEY HAVE BEEN PROMISED!
attributes.additional_details:
The government launched a compensation scheme in April 2019 with an estimated budget of £200-£570 million, at 28th May only 60 victims (out of 1275 applications) had received payments totalling £362,997. Many waiting for payments are in very difficult financial situations. The difficulty in making a claim and the slowness in processing claims is not acceptable. 
The Home Office is also putting obstacles in the way for people claiming compensation.
attributes.background:
WE DEMAND:

• all of the Windrush generation victimised by the government are paid a basic redress payment of £30,000 now. Claims for additional losses can then be made on a case by case basis.

• the policies that caused this scandal are reversed by the Home Secretary, Priti Patel.

rejection.details:
We have opened the petitions below relating to the Windrush generation, which you may wish to sign:

Windrush Scandal – Increase levels & speed of compensation: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/326229

Implement recommendations from previous reports into racial inequality in the UK: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/327671

Include Windrush generations in British Nationality Act Remedial Order: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/331350
